description.value: Destriers are the largest type of centaur, using their weight and size to their advantage. However, their size makes some elements of travel and maneuvering difficult.

system.classDetails:
Destrier Centaur Traits

  • Compatibility: Bestial (or Hominid with Alternate Compatibility)
  • Attribute Increase: Your Strength increases by 1.
  • Large Size: Your size is Large, taking up a 10sqft radius instead of a Medium creature’s 5sqft. Your height increases by about 2+1d4 feet, and your weight increases by 1d4-1, minimum of 1, times 50% of your core race’s weight. For example, if you are a pure-breed centaur, your weight might be around 1050-3000lbs at 9-14ft tall.
    As a large creature, you have the following traits: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.QJIK066JT0VMRODK]{Large}
  • Stamp: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.63I8T7TJ8C81LTSD]{Stamp}
  • *Alternate Compatibility: You can choose to instead have the Hominid compatibility for the sake of mix-racing, gaining the following traits.
    • Proficiency: You have proficiency in Wisdom (Culture).
